name: f6d3f692-cc50-5ef7-93f7-fff2a8c6bb3b
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Jungfraujoch, Switzerland (20140101 - 20150101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Jungfraujoch, Switzerland (20140101 - 20150101)
